about_the_game:
In-Game Video Production and Licensing:18cmSam
Game Production:Bananaking, 18cmSam

◆Featured Systems

◇Switch on the full CG mode in the environment settings to browse HCGs freely

◇Switch between several viewing angles in 3D animation to appreciate the beauty of women from the best angle

◇No time limit, easy to play

◆The Story

IYou were an ordinary engineer with a boring life. The only thing you looked forward to every morning was to turn on your laptop later at night and watch the live streaming of the pornographic female streamer "Ivy" on time, using her voice and sexy body to cover up the void in your heart. But on an ordinary day at work, Ivy unexpectedly entered into your life, following her were all kinds of adventures and accidents that you had never expected...

Your banal life was no longer ordinary, and a small sense of fantasy filled the gaps in your daily life. A story that was insignificant to the world but incredible to you was about to unfold...

Rationality or risk, conscience or sin, consideration or recklessness…Would you like to try to find the key route to pry open up a woman's heart among various choices?

Could you find what Ivy truly valued?

◆Gameplay Instruction

◇Peep, visit, film live streams, and arrange itineraries...cultivate your relationships with the four heroines through various means

◇From choices in the dialogues to the increase or decrease of your conscience, master the key route to your ideal amidst all kinds of paths!

◆Game features

◇Pornographic live streaming, exhibition in public, beauties in your arms, more than 20 different motion CGs

◇Game text: 100,000 words

◇One main female character and three side female characters waiting for you to crack

◇A plot-exploration based, comedy-themed game

◇Each female character has two endings, it all depends on your conscience and choices

Tools for game production：Acgcreator

Tools for creating 3DCG and 3D videos ：Virtamate

detailed_description:
In-Game Video Production and Licensing:18cmSam
Game Production:Bananaking, 18cmSam

◆Featured Systems

◇Switch on the full CG mode in the environment settings to browse HCGs freely

◇Switch between several viewing angles in 3D animation to appreciate the beauty of women from the best angle

◇No time limit, easy to play

◆The Story

IYou were an ordinary engineer with a boring life. The only thing you looked forward to every morning was to turn on your laptop later at night and watch the live streaming of the pornographic female streamer "Ivy" on time, using her voice and sexy body to cover up the void in your heart. But on an ordinary day at work, Ivy unexpectedly entered into your life, following her were all kinds of adventures and accidents that you had never expected...

Your banal life was no longer ordinary, and a small sense of fantasy filled the gaps in your daily life. A story that was insignificant to the world but incredible to you was about to unfold...

Rationality or risk, conscience or sin, consideration or recklessness…Would you like to try to find the key route to pry open up a woman's heart among various choices?

Could you find what Ivy truly valued?

◆Gameplay Instruction

◇Peep, visit, film live streams, and arrange itineraries...cultivate your relationships with the four heroines through various means

◇From choices in the dialogues to the increase or decrease of your conscience, master the key route to your ideal amidst all kinds of paths!

◆Game features

◇Pornographic live streaming, exhibition in public, beauties in your arms, more than 20 different motion CGs

name: Female Anchor Next Door

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Have you ever longed for a glimmer of sexual fantasy in your boring working life...like, a porn streamer you followed unexpectedly barging into your life? Discovering the secret of a female athlete in the gym? The yandere behavior of your juniors in the workplace? Or even...a magical girl coming to me?
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
